original_prompt: R&B, male singer, string, strong bass, drums, suited for an intimate setting

results.prompt: A male vocalist sings this groovy R&B. The tempo is medium with a funky bass guitar, steady guitar, bright electric guitar and keyboard harmony. The song is mellow, emotional, soft, smooth and engaging. This song is an R&B.

The Soul/R&B song features a passionate male vocal singing over shimmering hi hats, energetic crash cymbals, wide acoustic rhythm guitar melody, shimmering shakers, snappy snare, piano chords and mellow bass. It sounds passionate and romantic - like something you would sing to your partner.

A phone ring interrupts the song then a male voice is singing along to a digital drum with a strong clapping sound and a funky bassline. This song may be playing while wearing headphones while enjoying yourself.

This is a soul/R&B music piece. There is a trio of two male vocalists and a female vocalist singing melodically. The keyboard is holding the chords in the background while the electric guitar and the bass guitar are playing a groovy tune. The rhythmic background contains an electronic drum beat. The atmosphere is urban. The piece could be played during a retro-themed party at a nightclub.
